dotnetType.name: StringSerializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.StringSchema" /> and attempts to map it to
            any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new string serializer builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful result if the schema is a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.StringSchema" />; an unsuccessful
            result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Builds a string serializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated serializers should use for write operations.

Generates a conversion from the source type to the intermediate type. This override
            will convert a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />, <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />, <see cref="T:System.Guid" />,
            <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />, or <see cref="T:System.Uri" /> value to a string prior to applying the
            base implementation.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StringSerializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinarySerializerBuilderCase
